Package tests

tests package: defines functions used for testing the optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib library.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ABFGSTest
    Test-driver for the ArmijoBFGS optimizer in popt4jlib.GradientDescent package.
    AckleyFunction
    The Ackley test function for real function optimization.
    AlternateFunction
    Title: popt4jlib
    ASDTest
    A test driver class for testing the ArmijoSteepestDescent class for local unconstrained optimization implementing the classical Steepest Descent with Armijo rule for step-size determination algorithm.
    AVDFPTest
    Test-driver class for optimizing the Fletcher-Powell Function (defined and documented in tests.FletcherPowellFunction) using the AVD process.
    AVDTest
    A test driver class for testing the AlternatingVariablesDescent class for local unconstrained (or box-constrained) optimization implementing the "trivial" Alternating Variables Descent method (valid for non-smooth functions also).
    CliqueComputingTest
    a test-driver class to test the functionality of computing maximal weighted cliques in a graph (in the graph package).
    CliqueComputingTestMT
    a test-driver class to test the functionality of computing maximal weighted cliques in a graph (in the graph package).
    CliqueComputingTestMT0
    a test-driver class to test the functionality of computing maximal weighted cliques in a graph (in the graph package).
    CliqueComputingTestMT2
    a test-driver class to test the functionality of computing maximal weighted cliques in a graph (in the graph package).
    DDETest
    Test-driver class for the (Distributed) Differential Evolution algorithm implemented in class popt4jlib.DE.DDE.
    DEATest
    test-driver for the (Distributed) Evolutionary Algorithm implemented in the popt4jlib.EA.DEA class.
    DFATest
    test-driver program for the DFA (Distributed Firefly Algorithm) optimizer.
    DGAAFTest
    test-driver class for the DGA process for optimizing the AlternateFunction.
    DGADPSOTest
    a demo test-driver class exercises the combination (ensemble) of two meta-heuristics, namely DGA and DPSO in optimizing a single function, through the Observer Design Pattern implemented for these processes.
    DGAFPTest
    Test-driver class for optimizing the Fletcher-Powell Function (defined and documented in tests.FletcherPowellFunction) using the DGA process.
    DGATest
    Test-driver program for Distributed Genetic Algorithm meta-heuristic optimizer.
    DPSOTest
    test-driver program for the DPSO (Distributed Particle Swarm Optimization) algorithm.
    DropWaveFunction
    class implements the so-called Drop-Wave multi-dimensional function used in NLP method testing (mostly in meta-heuristic literature).
    DSATest
    Test-driver class for executing the SA algorithm implemented in the popt4jlib.SA.DSA class.
    FCGTest
    Test driver class for the Conjugate-Gradient algorithm using the Fletcher-Reeves formula for updating the b parameter, and the Al-Baali - Fletcher bracketing§ioning method for step-size determination.
    FixedPointApproximatorMTTest
    test-driver for FixedPointApproximatorMT.
    FletcherPowellFunction
    Title: popt4jlib
    GMeansMTClustererTest
    driver class for multi-threaded K-Means clusterer for MSSC (with or without KMeans++ initialization of seed cluster centers).
    GradApproximatorTest
    test-driver for the analysis.GradApproximator class.
    GriewangkFunction
    Implements the Griwangk test-function for unconstrained continuous optimization in n-dimensions.
    GriewangkFunctionGrad
    This class implements the Griewangk Function Gradient in n-dimensions.
    HashtableTest
    unimportant test for Hashtable functionality.
    LangermannFunction
    This class implements the Langermann Function in n-dimensions.
    LND10Function
    class implements the so-called LND10 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND1Function
    class implements the so-called LND1 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND2Function
    class implements the so-called LND2 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND3Function
    class implements the so-called LND3 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND4Function
    class implements the so-called LND4 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND5Function
    class implements the so-called LND5 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND6Function
    class implements the so-called LND6 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND7Function
    class implements the so-called LND7 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND8Function
    class implements the so-called LND8 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    LND9Function
    class implements the so-called LND9 function (continuous, non-differentiable).
    MaxCliqueComputingTestMT0
    a test-driver class to test the functionality of computing ALL maximum weighted cliques in a graph (in the graph package).
    MichalewiczFunction
    This class implements the Michalewicz Function in n-dimensions.
    MichalewiczFunctionGrad
    This class implements the Michalewicz Function Gradient in n-dimensions
    MonteCarloTest
    test-driver class for the Monte-Carlo Search method (random sampling of the search space).
    NeuralGasMTClustererTest
    driver class for multi-threaded NeuralGas clusterer for MSSC (with random initialization of seed cluster centers).
    Norm2Function
    This class implements the (weighted) ||x||^2 Function in n-dimensions.
    Norm2FunctionGrad
    This class implements the (weighted) ||x||^2 Function Gradient in n-dimensions.
    NormpdfFunction
    The normpdf function defined as follows: $$f(x) = (1/\sqrt{2π})e^{-||x||^2/2}$$
    NumericalConvolutionTest
    test-driver for the numerical integration classes.
    NumericalIntegrationTest
    test-driver for the numerical integration classes.
    ParallelRNGTest
    Test the ability of two threads using the RndUtil to generate the same sequence of numbers.
    PRCGTest
    Test driver class for the Conjugate-Gradient algorithm using the Polak-Ribiere formula for updating the b parameter, and the Armijo rule method for step-size determination.
    RastriginFastDefFunction
    This class implements the Rastrigin Function in n-dimensions with default parameters A=10, w=2π.
    RastriginFunction
    This class implements the Rastrigin Function in n-dimensions.
    RastriginFunctionGrad
    This class implements the Rastrigin Function Gradient in n-dimensions.
    RDTest
    test-driver class for the RandomDirections optimization algorithm.
    RosenbrockFunction
    This class implements the Rosenbrock Function in n-dimensions
    SchwefelFunction
    This class implements the Schwefel Function in n-dimensions.
    SimpleDGASocketEvalTest
    Test-driver program for Distributed Genetic Algorithm meta-heuristic optimizer using the socket-eval function.
    SocketEvalTestFunction
    implements a user-provided function evaluation.
    SparseVectorTest
    tests the popt4jlib.DblArray1SparseVector[MT/FE/...] class.
    TridFunction
    This class implements the TRID Function (convex quadratic) in n-dimensions The function assumes its global minimum at x=[n 2(n-1) ...
    TridFunctionGrad
    This class implements the Trid Function Gradient in n-dimensions.
    TridNonlinearFunction
    This class implements a variation of the TRID Function (convex quadratic) in n-dimensions that is highly nonlinear.
    WeierstrassFunction
    The Weierstrass test function for real function optimization.

Package tests Description

tests package: defines functions used for testing the optimization algorithms in the popt4jlib library.

Package Specification

definition of several well known test functions (convex as well as non-convex) non-linear multi-dimensional functions for NLP, as well as some test driver classes for the various algorithms defined in popt4jlib.
